articles.title: CEOs of NVIDIA and Lilly Share ‘Blueprint for What Is Possible’ in AI and Drug Discovery
articles.summary: NVIDIA and Lilly are putting together “a blueprint for what is possible in the future of drug discovery,” NVIDIA founder and CEO Jensen Huang told attendees at a fireside chat Monday with Dave Ricks, chair and CEO of Lilly. articles.author: Isha Salian

articles.title: AI’s Next Revolution: Multiply Labs Is Scaling Robotics-Driven Cell Therapy Biomanufacturing Labs
articles.summary: Startup works with leading cell therapy companies to bring robotics manufacturing into the clean room, reducing costs by more than 70% while accelerating output compared with legacy systems.
articles.author: Scott Martin

articles.title: NVIDIA and Lilly Announce Co-Innovation AI Lab to Reinvent Drug Discovery in the Age of AI
articles.summary: NVIDIA and Eli Lilly and Company today announced a first-of-its-kind AI co-innovation lab focused on applying AI to tackle some of the most enduring challenges in the pharmaceutical industry.

articles.title: NVIDIA BioNeMo Platform Adopted by Life Sciences Leaders to Accelerate AI-Driven Drug Discovery
articles.summary: NVIDIA today announced a major expansion of NVIDIA BioNeMo™, an open development platform that enables lab-in-the-loop workflows to develop breakthroughs in AI-driven biology and drug discovery.

articles.summary: Every “that was easy” shopping moment is made possible by teams working to hit shipping deadlines, scrambling to fix missing product details and striving to provide curated shopping experiences. articles.author: Cynthia Countouris

articles.title: AI Copilot Keeps Berkeley’s X-Ray Particle Accelerator on Track
articles.summary: In the rolling hills of Berkeley, California, an AI agent is supporting high-stakes physics experiments at the Advanced Light Source (ALS) particle accelerator. Researchers at the Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory ALS facility recently deployed the Accelerator Assistant, a large language model (LLM)-driven system to keep X-ray research on track. articles.author: Scott Martin

articles.title: Japan Science and Technology Agency Develops NVIDIA-Powered Moonshot Robot for Elderly Care
articles.summary: The next universal technology since the smartphone is on the horizon — and it may be a little less pocket friendly. articles.author: Zoe Kessler

articles.author: GeForce NOW Community

articles.title: Steel, Sensors and Silicon: How Caterpillar Is Bringing Edge AI to the Jobsite
articles.summary: At CES, Caterpillar reveals how it’s integrating NVIDIA technologies, from NVIDIA Jetson Thor to speech models, to transform the world’s heavy industries.

articles.title: From Warehouse to Wallet: New State of AI in Retail and CPG Survey Uncovers How AI Is Rewiring Supply Chains and Customer Experiences
articles.summary: AI has transformed retail and consumer packaged goods (CPG) operations, enhancing customer analysis and segmentation to enable greater personalization for marketing and advertising, and boosting the speed and accuracy of demand forecasting for supply chains and logistics. articles.author: Cynthia Countouris

articles.title: Siemens and NVIDIA Expand Partnership to Build the Industrial AI Operating System
articles.summary: Siemens and NVIDIA today announced a significant expansion of their strategic partnership to bring artificial intelligence into the real world.

articles.title: NVIDIA RTX Accelerates 4K AI Video Generation on PC With LTX-2 and ComfyUI Upgrades
articles.summary: 2025 marked a breakout year for AI development on PC. PC-class small language models (SLMs) improved accuracy by nearly 2x over 2024, dramatically closing the gap with frontier cloud-based large language models (LLMs). articles.author: Gerardo Delgado

articles.title: NVIDIA DLSS 4.5, Path Tracing and G-SYNC Pulsar Supercharge Gameplay With Enhanced Performance and Visuals
articles.summary: At the CES trade show, NVIDIA today announced DLSS 4.5, which introduces Dynamic Multi Frame Generation, a new 6X Multi Frame Generation mode and a second-generation transformer model for DLSS Super Resolution, so gamers can experience the latest and greatest titles with enhanced performance and visuals. articles.author: Jason Paul

articles.author: Brian Caulfield

articles.title: NVIDIA DGX SuperPOD Sets the Stage for Rubin-Based Systems
articles.summary: NVIDIA DGX SuperPOD is paving the way for large-scale system deployments built on the NVIDIA Rubin platform — the next leap forward in AI computing. articles.author: Charlie Boyle

articles.title: NVIDIA DGX Spark and DGX Station Power the Latest Open-Source and Frontier Models From the Desktop
articles.summary: Open-source AI is accelerating innovation across industries, and NVIDIA DGX Spark and DGX Station are built to help developers turn innovation into impact. articles.title: NVIDIA Expands Global DRIVE Hyperion Ecosystem to Accelerate the Road to Full Autonomy
articles.summary: At the CES trade show running this week in Las Vegas, NVIDIA announced that the global DRIVE Hyperion ecosystem is expanding to include tier 1 suppliers, automotive integrators and sensor partners, including Aeva, AUMOVIO, Astemo, Arbe, Bosch, Hesai, Magna, Omnivision, Quanta, Sony and ZF Group. articles.author: Mo Poorsartep

articles.title: NVIDIA BlueField-4 Powers New Class of AI-Native Storage Infrastructure for the Next Frontier of AI
articles.summary: NVIDIA today announced that the NVIDIA BlueField®-4 data processor, part of the full-stack NVIDIA BlueField platform, powers NVIDIA Inference Context Memory Storage Platform, a new class of AI-native storage infrastructure for the next frontier of AI.
